text:
Medical personnel,
such as nurses, first aid men and the like, who provide medical and first aid
services at the place of employment for other employees who are engaged in
commerce or in the production of goods for commerce are covered. Coverage is
based on the principle that such employees are engaged in activities which
facilitate commerce and are so proximately related to commerce as to be
properly considered engaged therein or that their activities are closely
related and directly essential to the production of goods for commerce.
html: Medical personnel, such as nurses, first aid men and the like, who provide medical and first aid services at the place of employment for other employees who are engaged in commerce or in the production of goods for commerce are covered. Coverage is based on the principle that such employees are engaged in activities which facilitate commerce and are so proximately related to commerce as to be properly considered engaged therein or that their activities are closely related and directly essential to the production of goods for commerce.
